entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
